title: Learning Analytics-Based Personalized e-Learning Design: Simulation/VR-Enhanced Social Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Core social science theories and practical field experience
context.additional_context: Customized educational courses combining VR simulations and e-learning content in smartphone-centric limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners achieve an 85%+ success rate in social problem-solving simulations within 4 weeks
Learners select content tailored to individual learning paces based on K-Means clustering analysis results
Learners demonstrate the ability to effectively diagnose real-world social field problems ≥3 times through VR-based activities

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
